long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your student recruitment experience with the Fledge Chrome Extension! Designed for use with gofledge.net, this powerful tool streamlines the process of creating company and people profiles for students recruiting. The Fledge Chrome Extension seamlessly integrates with Handshake and LinkedIn, automating the data extraction process to effortlessly fill your database.

Key Features:

Automated Profile Creation: Quickly generate detailed company and people profiles by leveraging the extension's web scraping capabilities. Extract valuable data from Handshake and LinkedIn with ease.

Enhanced Recruiting Efficiency: Empower your student recruitment efforts with accurate and up-to-date profiles. The Fledge Chrome Extension enables students to focus on meaningful engagements by automating mundane data entry tasks.

User-Friendly Interface: With a user-friendly interface, the extension is easy to navigate, making it networking intuitive and streamlined for newcomers.
